metadata.Name: SberQuAD
metadata.Description: SberQuAD is a Russian reading comprehension dataset based on Wikipedia articles. It contains question-answer pairs, where the answers are spans of text from the corresponding articles.
metadata.Abstract: We present SberQuAD, a new Russian reading comprehension dataset based on Wikipedia articles. The dataset contains 100,000 question-answer pairs, where the answers are spans of text from the corresponding articles. We provide a detailed description of the dataset creation process, including the selection of articles, question generation, and answer annotation. We also present a baseline evaluation of several state-of-the-art reading comprehension models on SberQuAD. Our results show that the dataset is challenging for existing models and provides a good benchmark for future research in Russian reading comprehension.
